Page Navigation Component

Navigation Panel used for building main navigation bar for SPS Commerce applications

Directive

Directive used to build page navigation control

Markup
 <spsui-page-nav
    items="ctrl.navItems"
    title="Sample Application"
    logo-image-url="images/app-icon.svg"
    title-state="dashboard">
 </spsui-page-nav>
Arguments
Name Type Details
items object, array Array of { state: 'state', url: 'url', name: 'name' } objects to build page navigation
title string Application title
logo-image-url string [Optional] URL to the application logo icon
title-state string [Optional] Default state which will be attached to application logo and title. By default first menu item state will be used.
Style Settings
Name Type Default Description
$page-navigation-height Number rem-calc(60) Navigation header height
$page-nav-separator-height Number rem-calc(34) Separator height between logo + app name and navigation items

Service

You can configure Page Navigation control using Page Navingation Service.

Add Items

Code
 pageNavigationService.addItem({ state: 'state', url: 'url', name: 'name' });

Manage Items

Name State Url Actions
Code
 pageNavigationService.removeItem(index);
 // or
 pageNavigationService.removeItem(item);
